comments.author: Jim Hammond
comments.content: China, a Communist government that forces Socialism on the majority of their population and controls the narrative of the state run media, has lied to their people and the rest of the world since the first case occurred on 12/28/19 and the real numbers of this pandemic. What makes it even worse is the fact that they are arresting their citizens who have been telling the truth about the actual number of cases of infected in that country, probably well over 100,000 people. The Chinese government has claimed this virus started in a food market, but don't be surprised if the Chinese government weaponized this virus intentionally  to not only divert attention from the uprising of their own population that is fighting for freedom and Capitalism, but knowing that this virus would intentionally spread throughout the world with the intention of not only infecting people in other countries, but negatively impacting the economies of other countries...specifically trying to halt the US economy. A downward turn in the strong US economy could have an impact on who gets elected as President in November. And I have no doubt that China would go to any extent to stop the US from electing the current President again, who has held China accountable for their unfair trade agreements in the past with the US and has currently cost China billions of dollars for their economy.
